desc: Whether you’re a CEO, a parent, or merely a person who wants to make a difference, you probably wish you had more influence with the people in your life. “Influencer” a thought-provoking book that combines the remarkable insights of behavioral scientists and business leaders with the astonishing stories of high-powered influencers from all walks of life. You’ll be taught each and every step of the influence process.

details.authors: Kerry; Grenny, Joseph; Maxfield, David; Mcmillan, Ron; Switzler, Al Patterson

title: Influencer : The Power to Change Anything
